name: Nature s Secrets Aloe Vera Body Wash
description: A luxurious and hydrating body wash with natural Aloe Vera to refresh your body before and after a busy day. Forget the days spent battling with dry skin. This body wash is 100% soap free and skin friendly at a pH of 5.5, so it will not dry your skin! Enjoy a lightly scented, soothing wash that leaves behind softer skin. No artificial colours added.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
